text: Clarity is a progressive house/electronic house song by Russian-German electronic music producer Zedd. It was released on November 12, 2012. It is from Zedd's debut studio album of the same name. The song won the Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording at the 56th Grammy Awards, making it their first win.https://web.archive.org/web/20111201232857/http://www.grammy.com/nominees ==References== Category:2012 songs
title: Clarity (song)
